description.value:
You channel the inner dragon at the peak of your zealous spirit and let loose a spiritual breath or carve a slash of divine power with your weapon. @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.macros.Macro.xumjguwPtOtkC7tL]{Spend your Zeal}, and creatures in a 30-foot cone from you need to make a @Check[reflex|against:dervish|basic] against your class DC. The effect of this Zenith is dependent on the amount of Zeal spent:

  • 1-2 Zeal: @Damage[max(2,(ceil(@actor.level/2)+1))d6[spirit]] damage, but targets treat their save as one degree of success better.

  • 3-4 Zeal: @Damage[max(2,(ceil(@actor.level/2)+1))d6[spirit]] damage, and an additional @Damage[max(1,(ceil(@actor.level/2)))d6[spirit,persistent]] damage on a critical failure

  • 5 Zeal: As 3-4 Zeal, but targets suffer persistent damage on a failure.

Special: If you are aligned to a particular type of dragon, such as through a draconic exemplar or bloodline, you can choose to deal damage matching their listed breath damage type instead of spirit damage.

Level (+2) The damage and persistent damage increases by 1d6.
